summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4610 for the improvement of West Eddy Street from 49th Avenue Southwest to 47th Avenue Southwest and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks andand otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53633, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
